# Introduction
Massa Station is one entrance door to Massa blockchain unlocking all possibilities. It enables everyone to access all blockchain functionalities in one single application. [Learn more](../wallet/massa-station.mdx)

For that, the Station app provides a module store with all existing plug-and-play services. As a user, you simply have to download Massa Station (link to the landing page) and start customizing your station to build the blockchain experience you want. As an entrepreneur or a developer, you can easily build your own module and add it to the store.
